snippet: This Fourth of July, the cannons will roar and the fireworks will burst in brilliant colors as a world class orchestra drives home the climactic finale of Tchaikovsky's "1812 Overture," as they have for decades over Boston's Charles River....
lead_paragraph: This Fourth of July, the cannons will roar and the fireworks will burst in brilliant colors as a world class orchestra drives home the climactic finale of Tchaikovsky's "1812 Overture," as they have for decades over Boston's Charles River.

headline.main: Boston's Signature July Fourth Fete Faces Uncertain Future
headline.print_headline: Boston's Signature July Fourth Fete Faces Uncertain Future
